ISSUE.TITLE: Missing man pages in installer (macOS)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description Podman installed from an installer on macOS does not contain man pages. This causes usability issues, such as not being able to find configuration mechanism defined in here: https://github.com/containers/podman/pull/23074 ``` podman compose -f podman-compose.yaml build >>>> Executing external compose provider "/usr/local/bin/docker-compose". Please see podman-compose(1) for how to disable this message. <<<< $ man podman-compose Unknown locale, assuming C No manual entry for podman-compose $ man podman Unknown locale, assuming C No manual entry for podman ``` Content of the installer: ``` pkgutil --payload-files podman-installer-macos-arm64.pkg . ./podman ./podman/bin ./podman/bin/podman ./podman/bin/vfkit ./podman/bin/krunkit ./podman/bin/._krunkit ./podman/bin/gvproxy ./podman/bin/podman-mac-helper ./podman/._bin ./podman/lib ./podman/lib/libkrun-efi.dylib ./podman/lib/._libkrun-efi.dylib ./podman/lib/libepoxy.0.dylib ./podman/lib/._libepoxy.0.dylib ./podman/lib/libMoltenVK.dylib ./podman/lib/._libMoltenVK.dylib ./podman/lib/libvirglrenderer.1.dylib ./podman/lib/._libvirglrenderer.1.dylib ./podman/._lib ``` Podman details - Installed from Podman Desktop on macOS 15.1.1 (24B91) ``` $ podman -v podman version 5.2.5 ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. Install podman from the installer 2. `man podman` 3. ### Describe the results you received No such man page was found. ### Describe the results you expected Man page is found ### podman info output ```yaml host: arch: arm64 buildahVersion: 1.37.5 cgroupControllers: - cpuset - cpu - io - memory - pids - rdma - misc cgroupManager: systemd cgroupVersion: v2 conmon: package: conmon-2.1.12-2.fc40.aarch64 path: /usr/bin/conmon version: 'conmon version 2.1.12, commit: ' cpuUtilization: idlePercent: 99.82 systemPercent: 0.09 userPercent: 0.09 cpus: 6 databaseBackend: sqlite distribution: distribution: fedora variant: coreos version: "40" eventLogger: journald freeLocks: 2047 hostname: localhost.localdomain idMappings: gidmap: null uidmap: null kernel: 6.11.3-200.fc40.aarch64 linkmode: dynamic logDriver: journald memFree: 7079395328 memTotal: 7716896768 networkBackend: netavark networkBackendInfo: backend: netavark dns: package: aardvark-dns-1.12.2-2.fc40.aarch64 path: /usr/libexec/podman/aardvark-dns version: aardvark-dns 1.12.2 package: netavark-1.12.2-1.fc40.aarch64 path: /usr/libexec/podman/netavark version: netavark 1.12.2 ociRuntime: name: crun package: crun-1.17-1.fc40.aarch64 path: /usr/bin/crun version: |- crun version 1.17 commit: 000fa0d4eeed8938301f3bcf8206405315bc1017 rundir: /run/crun spec: 1.0.0 +SYSTEMD +SELINUX +APPARMOR +CAP +SECCOMP +EBPF +CRIU +LIBKRUN +WASM:wasmedge +YAJL os: linux pasta: executable: /usr/bin/pasta package: passt-0^20240906.g6b38f07-1.fc40.aarch64 version: | pasta 0^20240906.g6b38f07-1.fc40.aarch64-pasta Copyright Red Hat GNU General Public License, version 2 or later <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html> This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it. COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add man pages to Mac installer This PR adds the man1 pages to the mac installer. It also sticks a small configuration file into /usr/local/etc/man.d that allows macos and the man binary to look for the podman pages in /opt/podman/docs/man. Fixes #24756 Signed-off-by: Brent Baude <bbaude@redhat.com>
